imdb.plot outline: From Istanbul, Turkey to Xian, China along the historic and fabled Silk Road, this eight-week adventure crosses the vast deserts of Central Asia, high mountain passes, and through crowded, bustling cities. Experience difficult riding conditions, mechanical breakdowns, accidents, and learn about the intrigue of the Silk Road's history, countries, and cultures that make the hardships more than worthwhile.
imdb.title: Globeriders Silk Road Adventure: A Motorcycle Journey
akas: Globeriders Silk Road Adventure: A Motorcycle Journey (United States)
plot: From Istanbul, Turkey to Xian, China along the historic and fabled Silk Road, this eight-week adventure crosses the vast deserts of Central Asia, high mountain passes, and through crowded, bustling cities. Experience difficult riding conditions, mechanical breakdowns, accidents, and learn about the intrigue of the Silk Road's history, countries, and cultures that make the hardships more than worthwhile.::Janson Media
